post:
Hi,

We have a couple of spare vps servers purchased for development activities.
Some of them aren't used. So wish to rent them away or sell them away at as low as 2 USD per month rate. ( 24 USD Per year )

Please let me know if anyone is interested.
> 
> **Configuration details are as follows:**
>  * 25 GB HDD
>  * 1000 GB Bw (1 Gbps)
>  * 1GB Memory
>  * 1 GB vSwap
>  * 1 IPv4
>  * Cent OS 64
